headline: North Wales preparing for ‘Earth Day Extravaganza’
author: Dan Sokil
sentences: April 23 will mark the sixth time the town has hosted the green-themed recycling event, not counting a two-year hiatus caused by COVID-19, Hart told council Tuesday.
“We are looking forward to our reduce, reuse and recycle event known as the ‘Earth Day Extravaganza,'” said borough Manager Christine Hart.
NORTH WALES — If you live in North Wales and have been looking to do some spring cleaning, Saturday’s the day.
